content: As you step through the next bit, be careful of the Lavabat. On the other side of this small cave, turn right and cross the bridge. Be ready to fight the Bull Soldier on the other side, but also watch out for the Revenant Charface tucked away on the right who will come at you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
As you step through the next bit, be careful of the Lavabat. On the other side of this small cave, turn right and cross the bridge. Be ready to fight the Bull Soldier on the other side, but also watch out for the Revenant Charface tucked away on the right who will come at you.
